description: Variation of condition 3 of planning permission dated 1 February 2016 (RN 15/10545/FULL) for the Variation of Condition 2 and addition of an extra condition to planning permission dated the 19.04.62 (RN: AR/TP.101923/C) for the 'erection of a building comprising basement, ground and five upper floors at No. 16-21 Sackville Street for use as shops or showrooms on the ground and first floors, showrooms on the second floor, offices on the third and fourth floors and residential accommodation on the fifth floor and with parking in the basement'; Namely to allow the use of two of the existing car parking spaces in the basement by the residential flats within the property and the use of the remaining twelve car parking spaces by both occupiers and users of the property and other residential occupiers within the defined Crown Estate 'Regent Street Estate' from RN 15/10545/FULL, NAMELY, to allow the use of 12 parking spaces at basement level by any occupier within the defined Crown Estate 'Regent Street Estate'.
decision_conditions: No loading or unloading of goods
Retain car parking for res occupiers
